name: Kehra
description:
Kehra is a First-Person Singleplayer game where you try to escape a simulation controled by an AI called "KEHRA" by playing and completing minigames (currently there is only one minigame available, but we'll add more in the future)

Features (or something like that idk)

  • "Hacking" (sort of)
  • Using a flashlight (also known as trying to see something)
  • Listening to music (there is literally music all the time)
  • Surviving (I'm impressed if you die, because it isn't possible...*)

Currently playable minigames

  • Escaping a maze to the beat of some really amazing music :D

*technically it is possible because you have limit hearts in a minigame but I wouldn't consider that as being able to die. Lets call it being able to "FAIL".
